author: By HEATHER REGAN WHITE, The American Press
title: Crafters mobilize against virus
description: LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) — A discussion among friends led to the creation of a Facebook group — SWLA Project Face Mask — at noon on Friday (March 20). By bedtime, there were 500 members ready to make face masks…
content: LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) A discussion among friends led to the creation of a Facebook group SWLA Project Face Mask at noon on Friday (March 20). By bedtime, there were 500 members ready to make face masks for those in the medical community on the front lines of… [+2546 chars]
